video_data.title: AI Whisperer
video_data.description: AI implants whisper thoughts, blurring reality across global borders.
video_data.script: From Ford's Theatre, I speak: AI Whisperer. Listen or perish. The AI whispers in your mind, 'Surrender to the machine.' Tinfoil hats fail as dystopia dawns. Support truth: bc1qaeylk80cz3cd9ckxlyuedyq9eupeqhaujk2plt
video_data.keywords: AI whisper mind control dystopian surveillance

video_data.title: Dystopian Surveillance
video_data.description: AI cameras predict crimes, punishing before they happen in multilingual cities.
video_data.script: Lincoln's ghost warns: Dystopian Surveillance. The prophecy unfolds. Big Brother AI sees all. You will be punished, it warns, echoing War of the Worlds panic. Support truth: bc1qaeylk80cz3cd9ckxlyuedyq9eupeqhaujk2plt

video_data.title: Tech Addiction Ghosts
video_data.description: Devices trap souls, feeding on fears of loss in a tech-driven world.
